1.content:
Alright, let’s start off with three of the lovely ladies in this game:

Yuzu ‘Yoohoo’ Tanikawa – One of the best friends of the Protagonist (Tendoh), known to have certain signs of affection for Tendoh, and tries to be cheerful most of the time, although as the lockdown continues, she begins to get emotionally drained. Her parents are divorced and life just keeps piling onto her. Although the shops in Tokyo are closed, it would appear that even times of strife, this busty girl is able to get herself some comfort food.
http://megamitensei.wikia.com/wiki/Yuzu_...

Midori Komaki – Known to the internet world as Dolly as a popular cosplay idol, she was in Tokyo for an event and couldn’t get out before the barricades were set up. She’s a firm believer of justice and has called herself a ‘Hero of Justice – Magical Dolly’ in order to save people from demons. How this spunky girl gains weight depends on where her path of justice leaves her.
http://megamitensei.wikia.com/wiki/Midor...

Yoshino ‘Haru’ Harusawa – The vocalist of the indie band D-Va, and one of the most beautiful characters in the game, albeit she does try to commit suicide in the game for thinking that she was the cause for bringing the demons into Tokyo. She was given her songs by the band’s former keyboardist, Aya, and even blames herself for her disappearance.
http://megamitensei.wikia.com/wiki/Yoshi...

More girls in the ‘More girls’ option.
1.title: Choose your girl

11.content:
It was a day like any other summer day in the Yamanote Circle – The sun blazing down on the streets as people of many ages and backgrounds went about their ways to kill the day. One such individual was a beautiful teenaged girl by the name of Yuzu Tanikawa – A young lass with medium long red hair held back by a pink headband (save for a good number of red strands in the front that flowed down the right side of her face). She was quite beautiful was endowed with a figure that could capture the hearts and eyes of every healthy young man (and the occasional woman) she passed, all contained in a pink blouse and blue/white striped tube top that hugged the wondrous mountains that she kept hidden. And the blue skirt and black knee socks showed off her finely toned legs.

Today was a day she would likely never forget, but as she walked through the streets, the young highschooler couldn’t help but munch on a box of chocolate pocky that she had brought from home. She had skipped breakfast that morning in order to meet with a couple of her high school friends in the Yamanote Circle (something about one of their cousins wanting to speak to the group about something important).

In any case, it was a reason for her to get out of the house, and possibly get some much needed shopping done.

“Excuse me…”

When Yuzu heard someone call out to her, the red-headed girl stopped and turned around to see a tall, handsome man behind her – he had combed down gray hair that lined his handsome features and was dressed in a black cloak that had green 1s and 0s on it (Yuzu was immediately reminded about an American movie she once saw, something called the ‘Matrix’ or something?). “You’re Yuzu Tanikawa, correct?”

Yuzu was a little unsettled at the man knowing her name, and took a step back slightly. The man chuckled and lifted one of his hands up defensively, “There’s no need to be so guarded – I’m simply Naoya, the cousin of one of your classmates. You know the one guy with combed down messy blue hair, usually wears those goofy white headphones that make you wonder if he’s listening or not?”

“Oh! You’re Tendoh’s cousin?” Yuzu questioned as the handsome man smiled.

“Ah, then you are one of his friends,” Naoya replied as he lifted up his other hand, holding up a small, black handbag. “I was hoping to run into one of you three, you see I have some matters to attend to and I won’t be able to meet you guys at that time. But I needed to give you guys these things as soon as possible, so, I was hoping that you could give one of these to Tendoh and Atsuro for me in my place.”

Yuzu finished the current piece of pocky she had in her mouth and held her free hand up, “Sure I guess, it should be a problem. What exactly am I giving them?”

“That’s a bit of surprise,” Naoya replied as he handed Yuzu the bag. “You’re more than welcomed to look at them, and even keep one yourself. But I would be careful about a few of the aps on those devices – Some of them are still in development.”

“Uh, sure,” Yuzu replied, not really much of a fan of techno-babble.

“Alright, well, thank you for your assistance Tanikawa-san,” Naoya thanked with a slight bow of his head before he turned around and began to walk away.

‘Is everyone in Tendoh’s family handsome like that?’ Yuzu thought as she reached for another stick of pocky and slipped it into her mouth.
Yuzu looked at the bag she was given, it wasn’t too heavy, but whatever inside it did spike her curiosity. And being a young lass who thrived on curiosity, Yuzu couldn’t help but peek into the bag. “Huh? Are these those 3DS’s I’ve heard about?”

Reaching into the bag, Yuzu produced a small, pink painted handheld device and flipped it open to reveal a device that definitely fit the handheld video game system genre – Two screens, two control pads (one was a D-Pad), and a few other buttons that had various letters on them. Yuzu blinked a few times in confusion (while munching on her pocky) as she pushed the on button.

The screen came to life and immediately read ‘Communication Player’ and Yuzu’s eyes immediately lit up, “Oh! These are COMPs! Wait, this is was Naoya wanted to give us? I know these things are expensive, but to call us out here just to give us these?”

As the menu on the COMP began to appear, Yuzu blinked a few times at the number of different apps that were on it – Some of them didn’t make any sense. Team? Group? And there was an even odder one – D-Possess. ‘As I thought, this is just for nerdy gamers…’

What happens next?

Option 1) Yuzu accesses the D-Possess application, which has her get possessed by a demon of lust and gluttony. Although she doesn’t realize it, every time she indulges in food, she’ll only crave more and more, and as a side effect, Yuzu will start to gain weight faster than normal – For her waistline’s sake, she should lay off of the Pocky (unless you want her to blow up like a fat balloon lol (And we know you all do)).

Option 2) Before Yuzu can access the applications, both Tendoh and Atsuro appear at the last second and stop her from doing so. However, after Atsuro takes his COMP to try to hack it, both Yuzu and Tendoh come across the Shomonkai, one of which is a heavy lady who’s COMP has been infected by a demon that actually transfers fat from one person to the user. Having already completed one of the jobs, the demon access’s Yuzu’s and begins to mess with her figure.

Option 3) Starts off as the second option, however, instead of the rest of the second one, the Laplace Mail speaks about how some random women have been found in the streets massively obese, surrounded by tatters of clothing, have their faces covered with remains of various deserts, and found in a euphoric sleep – Apparently, there’s a demon going around that’s stuffing girls to the gills, will Yuzu’s waistline be spared by this demon? (Probably not)

Options 4 and 5) If you can come up with something else, go for it.
11.title: Yuzu 'Yoohoo' Tanikawa

choices: After giving Atsuro and Tendoh their COMPs, Yuzu and Tendoh get lunch
111.content:
Yuzu sighed to herself as she looked at the various features on the screen of the COMP, ‘This isn’t my thing… If anything, that nerd Atsuro would probably chew off his left foot to get his hands on one of these… Hmm, there’s an interesting idea.’

Unbeknownst to the red-headed teen, her thumb was slowly inching towards the lower screen of the COMP, which anyone who at least read more information about the system (or at least has played any DS game) would know that it was a touch screen. Slowly, Yuzu’s thumb reached the corner of the screen, and even a touch of pressure was enough to activate the app that her thumb was atop of…

D-Possess.

As the screen flashed slightly, Yuzu was still thinking of how she could use the COMPs to at least get a decent laugh out of seeing Atsuro freak out of how ‘Yoohoo’ was able to score three COMPs (when he was only barely able to get one). However, the attractive young lass was unaware of the text that immediately flashed on the screen that said ‘Possession Complete’ before the entire device turned off.

Yuzu was also unaware that her eyes glowed an eerie, if not beautiful bright green before they flashed back to their normal shaded color. For a moment, Yuzu just stood there before she shook her head. ‘That was weird – Oh well…’

Subconsciously, Yuzu began to gnaw on the stick of pocky in her mouth until she inhaled the chocolate covered treat. And like she was an automatic machine, Yuzu reached into the box of pocky, and pulled out two sticks that she quickly nibbled on. Not even then did she realize that she was already finishing off the two sticks of pocky she had in her mouth and was reaching for the box once more…

“Hey! Yoohoo!”

The well-endowed teen spun around slightly (not noticing that there was a little more bounce to her chest when she did) to see a familiar duo – The nerd who was usually dressed in his hoodie and white cap Atsuro and the blue haired, white headphone wearing Tendoh – walking towards her. “Will you stop calling me Yoohoo?!”

“Hey, it’s just a fun little nickname,” Atsuro replied with a large smirk on his face.

“It’s not funny!” Yuzu retorted as she wagged a stick of pocky at Atsuro. “Most of the teachers think that’s my real name!”

“And that’s why it’s funny!” Atsuro replied.

Tendoh sighed loudly, this was going to be a long day.
111.title: D-Possession Activated

1111.content:
After Yuzu gave Atsuro and Tendoh their COMP, Atsuro got a devilish look on his face and said "Well, I'll leave you two lovebirds alone now, okay?"
"Lovebi- Hey! You can't just leave after saying something like tha-."
Before Yuzu could protest, Atsuro had left.

"Grrrrrrr....Atsuro........One of these days I'm gonna-"

*growl*

Yuzu was interrupted by a loud growl that came from her stomach.

*sigh* "I guess my anger issues can wait. You hungry? Want to go and grab a bite to eat?"

---
"So, where did you say you found this thing again?"

"I *slurp* didn't find it. This thing was given to me by *chomp* some handsome guy that claimed that he was your *munch* cousin."

Yuzu and Tendoh were eating at a restaurant known as Mega Meals. It had an all you can eat buffet that served cake, ramen, lemonade, steak, and many other wondrous dishes.

Yuzu had decided to get as much cake and ramen as she could eat. She was already starting to become a little pudgier, and her cheeks were now a little pudgier. She also had a bit of flab where her once flat stomach was.

"Hmmmm...... I wonder what this button does......" Tendoh said as he pushed the D-Posses button.

What happens next?

Choice 1: A demon posses Tendoh. This demon is a demon of desires and lust, and it gives Tendoh the desire to make Yuzu fat.
Choice 2: Another demon posses Yuzu, and she starts to crave food even more. Her motabolisim becomes slower, too.
Choice 3: Dealers choice.
1111.title: Lunch Survivor.

choices: Atsuro presses the D-Possesion button on his COMP.
11111.content:
After Tendoh pressed the button, his eyes turned into different colors, before returning to normal.

"Hey, are you okay?" Yuzu asked.

"Never bet-"
Tendoh stopped in the middle of his sentance. He was suddenly entranced by Yuzu's larger figure.
"Ahem* Never better. Do you want more food?"
"Huh? Y-yeah, why do you ask?"
"Because you seem hungry, and I don't want you to starve. Here. Let me get you some more food."

"Well, that was creepy, yet romantic." Yuzu said.
11111.title: Well, that escalated quickly.

111112.content:
"I wonder what this thing is?"

Atsuro had never seen the strange device Yuzu had given him. He didn't really look at when she gave it to him, mainly because he was trying to get away from a very angry Yuzu at the time.

Still, he was quite perplexed with this recent development. He had never seen this weird device before. He knew that it wasn't a video game console, and it certainly couldn't be some kind of bootleg device.
What was even stranger was the fact that Atsuro had recieved another D-comp in the mail on the same day he recieved his first D-comp.
"Huh. I wonder what will happen if I press the button...."
Atsuro pressed the button. Suddenly, his eyes turned yellow and purple before returning back to their original color.
"Hmmph." Atsuro said.
Suddenly, his D-comp said something to him.

"ATTENTION. DELIVER THE SECOND D-COMP THAT IS PRESENT ON YOUR DESK TO THE FOLLOWING TARGET: AMANE KUZURYU."

"Hmm, she looks familiar......"
"Oh, yeah.... She's that weird shrine maiden that I never talk to......"
"Maybe I should give her this D-Comp....." Atsuro said slowly.

As he said this, he couldn't help but think that Amane would look much better with some meat on her bones......
---
"Fourteenths, darling?"
"U-um, sure?"
"Alright."
Yuzu was now considerably larger than she was before. Her breasts were now 6 inches bigger, which made her bra a tight fit. Her stomach was a bit bigger, and love handles are starting to form on her. Her butt was starting to become covered with cellulite. Her face was now much puffier than it was before.

Yuzu didn't notice this, though. She was too focused on Tendoh's sudden request.

He requested that they deepen their relationship and become boyfriend and girlfriend. Yuzu accepted this offer with glee.
111112.title: Curiosity killed......thinness, I guess......

choices: Cut to Yuzu and Tendoh as they run into Yuzu's favorite plus sized singer Haru
Stick with Atsuro and Amane as Amane activates her D-COMP
1111122.content:
Tendoh made his way out of the booth, careful to not knock over the tower of plates that were haphazardly stacked atop one other when their contents had been consumed. He'd spent the last hour and a half at Mega Meals with his new girlfriend, Yuzu Tanikawa, who within said time had ballooned.

Yuzu had developed into a hourglass figure with a large chest, behind and a pudgy middle. Her breasts had reached the size of an average person's head and were testing the limits of her bra, to the point that it appeared painful. Yuzu's belly had swollen with food and fat, her stomach was stretched taunt and gave the impression she was months into a pregnancy. Both however failed to outshine the orbs that were her ass. Despite being well endowed in the chest prior to her blossoming, her ass had taken the spotlight and made itself Yuzu's largest asset. The twin boulders of flab stuck our like a shelf behind her and oozed across the booth seat. Her skirt had completely failed to cover a quarter of her ample behind and her pink panties were stretched across the expanse of her rear.

After taking in the size of his new girlfriend, Tendoh went to pay for the meal while Yuzu finished the last of the food. A few minutes later Tendoh came back and the duo walked to the doors. However, Yuzu in either ignorance or forgetfulness hadn't taken her size into account as she very quickly found herself stuck in the doorway.

"Um, Tendoh, could you give me a hand... my butt is too big for the door..." Yuzu asked, embarrassed, her face a deep crimson.

"Of course." Tendoh replied and placed both hands on her large rearend, and pushed. Her ass jiggled at the slightest movement and Tendoh's hands sunk deep into it. After a minute or two of effort Yuzu popped free of the doorway and they continued on home together.

------------------------------------------

Atsuro, meanwhile was searching various parks in search of Amane Kuzuryu to give her the D-COMP he had received in the mail.

After running into several groups of Shomonkai with none of them being Amane, Atsuro finally saw someone's who looked like her upon arriving in Shiba Park. He didn't take long to rush over.

"*pant* *pant* ...Are *pant* Are you Amane Kuzuryu?"

The girl in question turns to Atsuro and addressed him in a calm cool voice, "Yes I am, do you have business with me?"

"I *pant* was told to give this to you..." He quickly ruffled around in his bag until he found the 2nd D-COMP, "Here... I'm pretty sure a man by the name of Naoya sent it."

"Naoya? If Naoya sent it then I would be glad to accept it."
1111122.title: Lunch Survivor: Overstuffed

choices: Lilim has Yuzu gain the old way...
Nah, Lilim uses magic on her new play toy!
114.content:
It was a warm day, so taking the opportunity to wait for her two friends under the shade of a nearby tree, Yuzu continued to explore the COMP. 'E-Mail, internet access, and games? If they made it a little more compact, I might be willing to invest into one of these things.'

Yuzu tapped her finger on the screen a few times until she came to an odd screen, with some very ominous music playing through the small speakers of the device. 'Demon auction? Oh, is this supposed to be one of those online trading games that Atsuro's going on about?

"CONGRATULATIONS! For accessing the Demon Auction for the first time, you have received a free tamed demon!


The screen then flashed slightly for a moment until a rather beautiful looking woman with long blue hair, dressed in a yellow one piece with bat wings and a devil tail right behind her. Yuzu sighed as she rolled her eyes, "Lilim... Yeah, this is definitely something that Atsuro would be into..."

'... hehehe...'

Yuzu lifted her head up when she heard that little snickering and she looked around, it didn't look like anyone was nearby her to laugh. So, Yuzu shrugged it off, as she continued to mess with the COMP. Unbeknownst to her though, behind her was the very same demon she just received - Lilim. However, she was transparent, and no one seemed to notice the scantily clad woman who's hands were slowly hovering around Yuzu's body: Focusing around the teen's breasts, behind and her thin waist.

"Hmm... Such potential here. Such a weak will, one subject to temptation and my whims... And her body's quite nice. But she needs more... More..."

The transparent demon finally lowered her hands onto Yuzu, the brown haired girl unaware as Lilim grasped her breasts. "More... She needs more of everything..."

Lilim's hands slowly traveled south, and her hands began to knead Yuzu's trim stomach, "Now... How should I do this? I could always do this the slow and classic way - A little hunger manipulation, metabolism as fast as a slug, and a lazy mindset...

"Oooh, there's always the quick way: Magic. I could make her gain pounds and have her be oblivious until I wish it...

"Or I could be creative..."
114.title: A Sweet(?) Deal

1141.content:
"I think I'll fatten her the old fashion way." Lilim said with glee.

---
One hour later, at the super market....
"Yiu sure are buying a lot of sweets there, little lady." a clerk said. "Are you throwing a party or something?"
"One: Most of these sweets are just boxes of pocky. What kind of hostess feeds her guests pocky? Two: Since when are store clerks so nosy?"
Yuzu wasn't in the mood for this clerks antics. He had been staring at her breasts the entire time she had been standing in line.

---
One hour later, at Yuzu's house....
"Stupid *munch* perverted clerk....what does *crunch* he know?" Yuzu said as she chomped down on pocky.
1141.title: Lilim is an old fashioned girl.

1143.content: Lilith uses magic to make Tendoh like fat girls, and has him fall in love with Yuzu, making him want to make her father, or you could do something else.
1143.title: I ship em.

choices: Hit the fortune teller up - And gain a curse to grow
Midori and Yuzu - two possessions for the price of one!
12.content:
It was a great day for the cosplay web-idol!

Midori had gotten up early for her event down in Akibara for her fans, she had chosen the best outfit to showcase her slim curves and general cuteness for everyone, got her autographing pen for her to sign pictures of her… And after the event, ‘Dolly’ managed to get a decent amount of profits to help her acquire more of her cute outfits to help her fans.

She was finishing up her event (making sure to get in some last minute pictures with some of her fans) when the explosion that would start everything erupted from far away, and trapped everyone within the Yamanote Circle.

Needless to say, Midori wasn’t too happy with the predicament that she was left in. No change of clothes, stuck in the Yamanote Circle with no one that she really knew to help her in this crisis nearby, and worst of all…

“I’m boooooored!” Midori moaned as she slumped up against one of the many buildings in the Yamanote Circle. It certainly was a boring day – And with her caught in just her cosplay outfit for how long she was stuck here, well, it certainly did attract a number of wandering eyes (not that she wasn’t used to that sort of thing, heck most of the time she accepted it since it helped add to her internet reputation).

Still – the young cosplayer had to find something to occupy her time until the boundary was lifted… Most of the shops were still open, although they seemed to be rather crowded with people.
It was times like this that Midori wished she had invested in one of those COMPs that she had heard a lot about – Heck, she’d even seen a couple of her fans take her picture with the things too! That was really cool!

It was like a mini-laptop one could use in the palm of one’s hands… And it played games too!

But, unfortunately, Midori didn’t have that luxury.

So, pushing herself from the wall, Midori began to walk into the crowds in an attempt to find something to quell her boredom…
________________________________

Ideas:

Option 1: Midori comes across a weird fortune teller that offers to play a game with tarot cards – As the game continues, Midori comes across a weird fortune that seems to curse her to gain weight steadily over the next seven days… And once she gets a comp, that curse seems to intensify.

Option 2: Midori meets with the main group earlier than what the game has set, and she seems interested in staying with them. As they go through the motions of the first day, Midori notices that Yuzu is a little puffy around the middle (not much of a surprise since Yuzu seems to have a sweet in her mouth every other minute) – Thus, Midori watches Yuzu as she steadily gets bigger. When she and Yuzu are alone, she questions Yuzu and touches the comp that Yuzu has accidentally – Making her get possessed with a Demon of Gluttony and get the same fate as Yuzu…

Option three - five: Your choice.
12.title: Magical Dolly - Midori!

13.content: How does she gain weight?
13.title: Yoshino 'Haru' Harusawa

14.content:
Amane Kuzryu- The young maiden of the Shomonkai, the mysterious cult with links to the altered COMPs. Unlike other members of the group, Amane is a true servant of God. Additionally, she is the host of both God's harbinger, Remiel, and a recovering servant of Belberith, Jezebel.

Mari Mochizuki- The busty elementary school nurse is also one of Tadashi Kaido's childhood friends, as well as the host a certain demon with a vendetta against the vampire Kudlak. She is one of the most important characters in the bloodless murders sidestory.

Shoji- A reporter whom Tendoh and his party meet occasionally in their travels. She is secretly investigating the death of her mentor.

Izuna- A government agent working alongside her commander, Fushimi. She obeys her orders, despite her personal objections to what will occur on the 7th day.
14.title: More Girls

choices: Jezebel practically drives Amane rabid for food.
Tendoh's party arrives in time for some Shomonkai preachings.
141.content:
Little was getting done today for the Shomonkai maiden. Her soapbox preachings in the park fell on deaf ears. It saddened her, knowing what was bound to happen within the week. The only good thing was that Naoya had finally finished on the COMP alteration project. Still, not much could be done until the first day began, as would her duty.

She paced for a few minutes, clearly nervous. She felt a pang in her stomach, yet did her best to ignore it. She had figured it was the all-too familiar demon Jezebel behind it. She'd gone through such moments ever since her father selfishly sealed the Bel demon within her. Little did she know that today, the demon would win.
141.title: Amane Kuzuryu

142.content: How does she gain weight?
142.title: Mari Mochizuki

144.content:
"Are you sure this is the only way to prevent the demons from breaking the lockdown?" Misaki questioned her commander.

"It is not our place to question the government's decision." Fushimi replied in a stern tone.

"But what about the civili--"

"Izuna! If those demons get outside the lockdown there will be more civilians in harms way. Unless a new solution is found the only chance we have is to use the final option. Do you understand?"

"...Yes sir. If someone can find a way to deal with the demons before the deadline then the final option is unneeded."

"Yes... What are you planning Izuna?"

Izuna turned away from her commanding officer, vibrant orange hair blowing to the side from a stray breeze. "Nothing, sir."

------------------------------------------

(Option 1) Izuna leaves the tunnel alone and COMP-less. What she encounters is a very abundant amount of food from supply drops.

(Option 2) Izuna leaves the Tunnel after meeting Tendoh and getting a COMP. (Also is it just Izuna or is Tendoh's female friends pretty pudgy?)

(Option 3) Dealer's Choice
144.title: Misaki Izuna-Short Tempered Special Forces Officer

145.content:
After all, it still counts.

Io Nitta - A girl who attends the same class with the protagonist. While admired by other students, she usually has trouble asserting herself.
http://megamitensei.wikia.com/wiki/Io_Ni...

Makoto Sako - A mature and dignified member of the Tokyo division of the JP's who has sworn complete loyalty to the organization.
http://megamitensei.wikia.com/wiki/Makot...

(Not enough room here, so let's click on more to get the rest)
145.title: Can't forget about the sequel

1451.content:
Tendoh (I'm using it for the other protagonist too) likes fat girls, and Io likes him (which is obvious if you play the game) and wants to get fat for him, if this is set before, after the disaster, or if it just never happens at all, is up to you.

Or d-possession, like in the Yuzu chapter

OR other
1451.title: Io Nitta

info.brief_description: The girls from Devil Survivor are getting bigger in seven days. How is up to you!
info.description:
Devil Survivor
7 Days To Gain


Since there hasn’t been any real devoted interactive stories pertaining to this awesome installment of the Shin Megami Tensei series, I figured that I’d be the first to do so. Now, I wanna point out that this story only goes with the first installment of the game since the first game is the only one in the U.S. at the moment. But if the second game comes to the shores of the U.S., then I’ll edit the story so you can have girls from there gain.

Now, there are a number of girls that you guys can choose from:

From the well-endowed Yuzu ‘Yoo-hoo’ Tanikawa, to the playful cosplayer Midori Komaki, the exotic indie-singer Yoshino ‘Haru’ Harusawa, Amane Kuzuryu the maiden of the Shomonkai cult, the sexy nurse Mari Mochizuki or any of the numerous beautiful women that appear among the ranks of this JRPG.

What’s this? You don’t know who these girls are?

Well then, head over to the wiki to check out images and to learn about the characters. Here’s a link:

http://megamitensei.wikia.com/wiki/Shin_Megami_Tensei:_Devil_Survivor

Now, a few rules – Since you’ve only got seven days to live in the Tokyo before the end of the world, slow weight gain isn’t going to cut it. But since you’ve got demons all over the place, feel free to use that, but here’s the rules:

1) No gains like – Yuzu ate a cupcake, and gained a thousand pounds
2) Try to keep the characters alive – Even if their Death Clocks say zero, they should be able to survive like they did in the story.
3) Only girls get to gain in this, but please don’t forget the guys that are in this.
4) You can mention sex, even write about it – But don’t be too graphic. That being said, the girls will grow out of their clothes, so you can have nudity going on.
5) Please be sure to have some proper grammar and spelling – They are actual functions on Writing.com, so use them please.
6) Have fun.
7) And as regards to the nameless protagonist, let’s just call him Tendoh, which is the Japanese word for Heaven (once again, play the game and you’ll get it).

So, let’s have you click on that little link down below, and we’ll enter this interactive!
info.pretty_title: SMT Devil Survivor: 7 Days to Gain
